items.name: Workestrate LLC
items.description:
Looking for a partner that can work with you on automating and streamlining your business?  

Workestrate is a digital transformation partner that focuses on enabling your business to be run from a single Microsoft cloud-based application - Dynamics 365 - that will integrate into your day-to-day business processes - Sales, Customer Service, Order Entry and Finances - with applications you already use such as Word, Excel, Outlook and new ones like Microsoft Planner and Microsoft Teams that you are probably not using today.

We can provide you a Dynamics 365 SmartStart implementation package for a cost-effective 2-week implementation or provide a fixed-cost automation and optimization project. 

Our offerings include (1) Assessments,  (2) Implementations, (3) Proof of Concepts and (4) Workshops and  (5) Salesforce.com Migration services.  We have worked with customers in the following industries: Cable and Internet, Telecom, Food Franchise, Insurance, Manufacturing, Printing, Membership and Associations,  and  Non-Profits

In addition, Workestrate can simplify, secure and disaster-proof your office infrastructure by moving and managing your servers, storage, network, disaster recovery, backups and even your desktop hardware to the Azure Microsoft cloud. 

Imagine all your office people not having to deal with hardware troubleshooting issues. On-board new employees in minutes, deploy new office locations in 24 hours! Reduce hardware cost-of-ownership. Restore desktop computers in minutes.

Our cloud infrastructure services services include: setting up a virtual network, firewall, intrusion prevention, SSL VPN portal, a new Active Directory domain controller, virtual desktops, file and application servers, ADFS, DNS, Office 365, Backup & Disaster Recovery (BDR) and much more within 24 hours.

Based in Kansas City, Missouri, Workestrate can help you take your business to the next level of digital automation. Call today to learn how we can bring your company to the digitally connect workflow.

Workestrate Covered Area:

Local Kansas City - Kansas metro area: Kansas City, Overland Park, Olathe, Leawood, Shawnee
Local Kansas City - Missouri metro area: Independence, Raytown, Blue Springs, Lee's Summit, Parkville, Gladstone, Claycomo

items.name: Thinkspace It
items.description: ThinkSpace IT focuses on a creative approach to technology so we can help our customers get the most out of their solutions.  With a proven record of satisfied customers across varied hardware and software platforms, we are highly qualified to meet all of your IT infrastructure needs.  Our extensive partner network includes Google, Intel, HP, Xerox, and Microsoft, which allows us to provide best in class IT Solutions, Cloud Hosting and IT Support Services.

items.name: National Support
items.description: We are a one stop shop when it comes to your computers, security, upgrades, and managed services.

items.name: SALVUS TG,LLC
items.description:
An IT department is so much more than fixing computers. Performance, security, compliance, data backup, user access, procurement, growth and scalability being just a handful of items on the long list of an administrator’s duties.

At Salvus TG, we have expertise in all of these categories and more. Let us help you elevate your IT Department from fixing computers to a fully managed technology department.

items.name: Network Systems Plus Inc
items.description:
NetSys+ provides IT consulting services for business.  As a Microsoft Gold Certified Partner, we work with organizations to implement and support technology that is cost efficient and flexible.  

From planning and purchasing to monitoring and support, NetSys+ partners with clients to take the hassle out of IT.

Every business has unique needs and every business, large or small, deserves an expert.

items.name: Csi, L.L.C.
items.description: We have over 20 years of experience in understanding, installing and providing service on hardware, software and networks.  CSI works hard at being the best in our IT field. That means getting and keeping key industry certifications, attaining and beating our Service Level Agreements with our customers, and working seamlessly with our hardware and software partners (Dell, Cisco, Avreo, Cyberscience, Privaplan, Eizo, Konica-Minolta and more). We’ve been fortunate enough to have that hard work recognized by the Industry: we are CISCO Certified, have Microsoft Certified technicians and engineers, A Dell Premier Provider, and one of Ingram Micro’s Top 500 Fastest Growing SMB Partners in the U.S. Just recently, we were named “Best in Sioux City For IT, 2014” (nothing like home-town recognition!)

items.name: Business Computer Services Inc
items.description: We provide solutions for SMB customers to help them operate more efficiently in todays ever changing world.

items.name: KONTEMPORARY KEYBOARDS INC
items.description:
At KKi, solving your technology problems and helping your business benefit from technology is more than a business. If all we cared about were making a dime, we would offer a more traditional, break/fix approach to IT support.

But we care about our clients. We want them to succeed. So we take a better approach, a proactive, preventative approach to IT support.  And that comes with a promise:
KKi's 100% Satisfaction Guarantee - If you're not completely satisfied with our services, you don't pay. Period. No fine print.

KKi, Small town, small business technology done right.

items.name: ELECTRIC INNOVATIONS
items.description: Electric Innovations with offices in Sioux City Iowa, Sioux Falls South Dakota and Omaha Nebraska is te midwest's premier electrical contractor for low voltage electrical systems. EI is your complete solution for fire alarms, security and surveillance systems, network infrastructure, telephony and managed IT solutions

items.name: trigenttech
items.description: Trigent Technologies is a local company you can trust.  Trigent has been in business since 2000 and began with 3 IT employees from Phillips 66.  From our humble beginnings we have grown to over 50 clients and many more to come.  Our philosophy stems from our moms, "Treat others the way you want to be treated" and it has carried us through thick and thin.  Now, 18 years later, we are the premier Managed IT Service Provider for numerous small businesses around the Bartlesville and Owasso area.

items.name: PRO COMPUTER SOLUTIONS
items.description: Pro Computer Solutions, Inc. is provides Full-Service IT systems and networking support to small and medium sized companies in the Greater Kansas City area and beyond.   We listen and work with our clients to provide complete technology solutions at a fixed monthly cost to meet their specific needs.   This unique approach eliminates the need for our clients to have to hire and maintain an internal IT Staff; saving them from the headaches involved with payroll, hiring expenses, and staff turnover.

items.name: Spectral Networks Inc
items.description:
Spectral Networks can also provide customers with resources to manage their IT infrastructure without the need or cost of a full-time staff. We can provide managed VoIP phone systems, fully managed networking services, fully managed virtual data center. 

Whether you're looking for someone to fully manage your IT, compliment it, or just a resource to improve your IT infrastructure, you can rely on Spectral Networks. We will cater to any IT business need.

items.name: Compu-Tek, LLC
items.description:
Compu-Tek, LLC 
IT consultants providing services for small and medium businesses (SMB) for over 20 years.

items.name: carpasean LLC
items.description: carpasean is a niche Information Systems Outsourcer offering full management and administration, supplemental or temporary resources, and general consulting for business technology and technical analysis units. Specializing in salvaging projects gone wrong, we are your go to partner for outside the box critical thinking to turn your runaway technology projects and systems into assets that work for you so you can stop being a slave to IT.

items.name: Unbreak-IT
items.description: At Unbreak IT, our focus is to help you more effectively manage your small or medium business by bringing it online. We can deploy and maintain hosted email, servers, cloud PBX systems, websites, and more. By leveraging Microsoft's and Amazon's infrastructure, we can provide you enterprise level service at a small business price.

items.name: CUSTOM TECHNOLOGY SOLUTIONS, INC
items.description: Custom Technology Solutions (CTS) have been supporting businesses in various industries for over 18 years.  We understand how a fast, stable and secure technology platform is essential to run a successful business.  "Break free" from the typical local IT support company that offers expensive "Block-of-Hours" or an archaic break/fix support model.  Move to an IT partner that understands that you, the "business owner" should focus on your core business functions and not on any technical related issues.  With over 200 customers throughout North America, we know what IT takes to support even the most demanding customer requirements.  CTS is confident that we can create a custom technology IT solution that is right for you and your business.  Fill in the quick PING-US contact form to the right and let us show you how you can get the most out of your technology investment.

items.name: ADC Solutions LLC
items.description: ADC Solutions is a part of the Oklahoma community, and our goal is to be known as the best local IT services and support company. When we say we're "managing IT for you," it means we cover what you need most: IT managed services, disaster recovery & business continuity, IT refreshes & hardware and software upgrades.

items.name: 405IT
items.description: 405IT is a National Managed Services Provider and IT consulting company based out of Oklahoma City.  We provide a complete spectrum of services from on premise hardware to full on public and private cloud computing environments.  We specialize in business process improvement focusing on facilitating a more efficient and cost effective solution to increase not only the performance of your datacenter but your business as a whole.

items.name: NvYA Technology, LLC
items.description: NvYA Technology is Oklahoma's #1 IT services provider.  We provide complete, enterprise-level IT services for companies of all sizes.  These services include fully managed IT services, cloud services, as well as on-site and remote support services.
